729646f-b.title: Richmond: Sharrotts Road - Bloomingdale Road
729646f-b.text:
187 2harrotts Road, north side, west of
Bloomingdale Road. The house was owned by R. Winant in
1853; by D. Lending in 1874; by Robert Landon in 1898,
and by Dawson Landon in 1907. Dates reter to maps on which
the owners' names appear.
August 27, 1930
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
The same, at a later date.

728609f-a.title: Richmond: Bloomingdale Road - Sharrotts Road
728609f-a.text:
(1)
535 Bloomingdale Road, east side, north of
Sharrotts Road. The house belonged to the Hinds
family until 1898. It was later (1907) the proper-
ty of Mary Riley; still later (1917) that of Charles
E. Freymann. The above dates refer to maps on which
the owners' names apnear. The view is north from
Sharrotts Road.
June 1, 1930
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS  N 1p,2  (E. 9S33
(2)
Another view of the house, at a later date.
May 12, 1937
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTINS
(3)
The same house, an additional view.
Octoher 12, 1935
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
